Articles.Content:
!!!!READ!!!!

Before you reply telling me how to build great SSTOS, that was not my point. I just wanted to create a fun/funny video. So enjoy!

So, I finally decided to make a video. Enjoy, it took me an hour to upload it, in 1080P! My highest quality video yet with no lag, + Explosions!

Edited May 27, 2013 by The Destroyer

Just keep it simple. https://mega.co.nz/#!2YlQCD5I!FB1h00JXKkuxOMJ9NdJHkhd_XPgZyDaJy94q8iHrlDQ can get into orbit and back with six parts! (There isn't much payload capacity if any but it is a good demonstration of how burning fuel reduces mass!)

You didn't get it, did you.

I was making this for fun. For laughs. I had no intention of making a real SSTO, but to make something that would probably fail, but maybe not. Just trying to make a video thats funny, inspired by Danny6246.

You didn't get it, did you.

I was making this for fun. For laughs. I had no intention of making a real SSTO, but to make something that would probably fail, but maybe not. Just trying to make a video thats funny, inspired by Danny6246.

. My apologies. I had not watched the vid

. My apologies. I had not watched the vid

Ah it's fine. I would probably have done the same thing. But, it sure does make a good title

I spent days working on a SSTO that actually could get to 120km orbit with fuel left over. After I did I found I had very little use for it. It was good fun though. Learned a lot about the mechanics of the game. I have found my rockets are far better for it too.
I built an SSTO that can barely deliver a tiny probe into orbit. Still, it took me weeks to get working and now I mostly use it for fun, and the occasional crew transfer.
spaceplane or ssto? it can be one or both, but ssto alone doesent limit to spaceplanes. is this about ssto ships in general?

Again, this is not about me asking advice for SSTOS. I was just trying to create a funny video showing my attempts at a SSTO that wasn't really serious.

EDIT: Thanks for the move. I forgot about this section.

Edited May 27, 2013 by The Destroyer
